critique: The document is an executive order about land withdrawal. The primary emotions the President wants to elicit are likely related to trust and confidence in the government's ability to manage public lands responsibly. There isn't strong emotional language, so the scores will be low. Initial scores: Joy: 2, Sadness: 1, Anger: 1, Fear: 1, Disgust: 1, Surprise: 2.
